artist: Painter: After Pieter Gerritz von Roestraeten; Engraver: William Henry Worthington; Publisher: John Major
description: portrait after a self portrait ; half length; turned left looking at viewer; head tilted right; smiling; glass in left hand; pipe in right hand; seated at table with jug on table; illustration from Walpole's 'Anecdotes of Painting in England'
inscription:
Signature, Title,Date, and Inscription

on sheet in black: Seipse pinx\'t   W.H. Worthington sculp. / ROESTRATEN / LONDON / Publaished by John Major, 50 Fleet Street / May 15th, 1827 | on sheet in pencil: 2-308
portfolio: From Anecdotes of Painting in England
title: Roestraten
